content.rendered:
Dear Maple Avenue Families,

We hope you’re enjoying the final days of summer! Below are important dates and information.

Friday, August 22nd or Saturday, August 23rd
Student schedules will be sent out via Parent Square

Tuesday, August 26th – Discover Maple
Grade 6 and New Families are invited and must register for either the AM or PM session via Parent Square. Tons of fun activities will take place and a BBQ lunch will be provided. Students will be able to follow their schedule, access their lockers, and obtain their school issued device and charger as well. Please bring a copy of your child’s schedule with you.

Wednesday, August 27th
Grade 7/8 Walk-through (9am to 12pm) – grade 7/8 students will be able to follow their schedule, access their lockers, and obtain their school issued device and charger. Students should bring a copy of their schedule.

We’re looking forward to kicking off the 2025-2026 school year.
